00034 #include <string>
00035 
00036 #include "split.h"
00037 #include "vq_conf.h"
00038 
00039 using namespace std;
00040 using namespace vq;
00041 
00050 string split(const string &str, const string &sep, 
00051     const string &rep, string::size_type cnt, bool rev ) {
00052     string ret;
00053     string::size_type i, len=str.length(), beg=0, pos=0, slen = sep.length();
00054     if( ! sep.empty() ) {
00055             for( i=0; i<cnt && i<len; i++, beg = pos+slen ) {
00056                     pos = str.find(sep, beg);
00057                     if( ! rev ) ret += str.substr(beg, pos-beg) + rep;
00058                     else ret = str.substr(beg, pos-beg)+rep+ret;
00059                     if(pos == str.npos) return ret;
00060             }
00061     } else {
00062             for( i=0; i<cnt && i<len; i++, beg = pos+slen ) {
00063                     if( ! rev ) ret += str.substr(i,1) + rep;
00064                     else ret = str.substr(i,1)+rep+ret;
00065             }
00066     }
00067     return ret;
00068 }
00077 string split(const string &str, string::size_type len, 
00078     const string &rep, string::size_type cnt, bool rev ) {
00079     string ret;
00080     string::size_type i, slen=str.length(), beg=0;
00081 
00082     for( i=0; i<cnt && beg<slen; i++, beg += len ) {
00083             if( ! rev ) ret += str.substr(beg,len) + rep;
00084             else ret = str.substr(beg,len)+rep+ret;
00085     }
00086     return ret;
00087 }
00088 
00089 string split_dom( const string & dom ) {
00090     return split_dom(dom, ac_split_dom.val_int());
00091 }
00092 
00093 string split_dom( const string & str, string::size_type cnt,
00094         const string &rep )
00095 {
00096     string ret;
00097     string::size_type i, len=str.length(), beg=len, pos=0;
00098     for( i=0; i<cnt && i<len; i++, beg = pos-1 ) {
00099             pos = str.rfind(".", beg);
00100             ret += str.substr(pos+1, beg-pos) + rep;
00101             if(pos == str.npos) return ret;
00102     }
00103     return ret;
00104 }
00105 
00106 string split_user( const string & u ) {
00107     return split_user(u, ac_split_user.val_int());
00108 }
00109 
00110 string split_user( const string & u , string::size_type c )
00111 {
00112     return split(u,"","/",c);
00113 }

00115 #ifdef SPLITTEST
00116 #include <iostream>
00117 int main()
00118 {
00119     string t="d.xxc.a.fg.";
00120 #define test_(x) cout<< t << ' ' << #x << '=' << x << endl;
00121     test_( split(t,".","/",2) );
00122     test_( split(t,".","/",4) );
00123     test_( split(t,".","/",20) );
00124     test_( split(t,"xxc"," ",5) );
00125     test_( split(t,1,"/",2) );
00126     test_( split(t,1,"/",2,true) );
00127     test_( split(t,3,"/",5) );
00128     test_( split(t,3,"/",5,true) );
00129     t+= "xxc.fdg.xxc.sd";
00130     test_( split(t,"xxc"," ",2) );
00131     test_( split(t,"","/",2) );
00132     test_( split(t,""," ",5) );
00133     t = "test.pl";
00134     test_( split(t,".","/",3) );
00135     t = "hosting.sarp.org.pl";
00136     test_( split_dom(t) );
00137     test_( split_dom(t, 2) );
00138     test_( split_dom(t, 0) );
00139     test_( split_dom(t, 10) );
00140     t = "Asdasd";
00141     test_( split_dom(t) );
00142     return 0;
00143 }
00144 #endif
